nodes.name: addAdmin
removeAdmin
setPlatformWallet
setOwner
addAdmin
removeAdmin
setPlatformWallet
setOwner

addAdmin(address).notice: Adds an admin to the market contract

removeAdmin(address).notice: Removes an admin from the market contract

setOwner(address).notice: Allows owners to set new owners for the contract

setPlatformWallet(address).notice: Sets the platform wallet to send/receive payments
